website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour HOVR Infinite was favorably accepted by the majority of its users. Positive reviews surround the shoe, mostly regarding its functionality and construction; there are minimal criticisms on a few of the shoe’s features. Many of the purchasers of the Under Armour HOVR Infinite were satisfied with the shoe and claimed that they would recommend it to other potential buyers. To them, Under Armour was successful in creating a running shoe that combines performance and technology.
pros: The Under Armour HOVR Infinite is comfortable enough for everyday use, according to various customers
The HOVR midsole provided great energy return, a couple of runners reported
One reviewer said the shoe fit snugly without being too tight
A few purchasers were impressed with the connectivity feature of the HOVR Infinite
The shoe is also suitable for walking and for gym workouts, commented by some users
Many wearers were pleased with the width options offered with the shoe
A constant buyer wrote that the HOVR Infinite is one of the brand’s highest-quality shoes in terms of materials and construction
Several users confirmed the smooth transition that the shoe provides
cons: The Bluetooth connection of the HOVR Infinite experiences glitches sometimes, a user said
One runner claimed the shoe is not comfortable to be used for long-distance runs
A couple of wearers observed that the shoe took a long time to be broken in

customer_reviews.title: Poor Tech/Shoe's rarely pair with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: They rarely connect, I have just quit trying since 75% of the time I am just disappointed. The shoes are comfortable and look good, thank goodness for that because the tech is worthless. If you are buying them because of the mapmyrun sync don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Scot M. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Under Armour shoes ever and I am sold, from the second I put them on and laced them up, then went for a small run to try them out. I will definitely be buying the HOVR Infinite in all colors, as far as the Bluetooth I had not connected up yet but I will for sure on my next outing. Definitely would recommend these shoes!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SEADOO RXT

customer_reviews.title: Mesh net ripping
customer_reviews.text: Feel pretty good but the mesh net that encapsulates the sole is ripping off. Hopefully, it’s just cosmetic but in the description is says this netting is functional which has me worried. Expected better quality at this price from UA.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but not a problem
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are quite heavy compare to the UA Sonic & UA Phantom SE which I also own, however this are not a problem for running short distance as your foot feels very cushioned. The app is amazing, it gives you a very good feedback and it's almost adentical as the ones provide it by my Smart Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo M't

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great. I need a wider toe box and these have that. They also have a wider middle part of the shoe which is also something I need. These shoes are very responsive, I've ran about 400 miles in these and haven't once had any foot or leg discomfort due to these shoes. And they're still not talking apart so great quality. I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: KLICK

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but the picture should have been shown the red color on the bottom of the shoes. Your picture doesn’t show it clearly. It showed it to me that all the shoes have the same color. I would prefer it like this.
customer_reviews.author: SUHAIL

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, weird ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Got this shoe and it was amazing for about 2 weeks, then I started to notice the ankle cushion on the left side started to wear. The cushion eventually lost its shape and slid down. So the shoe fits awkward but is manageable. That is my only complaint. Easy to walk in or workout in. Maybe i got a defective one idk but im mixed about it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great over long distances
customer_reviews.text: Have used Asics for years then read a review that recommended these Under Armour shoes over long distances and they weren't wrong. Highly recommended if you are training for half marathon+ distance races.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, love these sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, love these sneakers! Perfect fit and love the sensors these work really well with the app and can improve your running or workout, very impressive and glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: JJBV

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST SHOE EVER
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best shoe I have ever worn. I run many miles reffing soccer. Foot and calf pains are non existent. They feel great on turf, grass and hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: shanon shivers

customer_reviews.title: Not the best shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth chip and the app to track steps and exercise is a great tool and fairly accurate. The shows however hurt my feet and aren’t of the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner H.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Shoe But I Like The HOVR Cross Training Shoe Better
customer_reviews.text: A good shoe with good cushioning but I like the cross trainer HOVR better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ran a whole marathon with this shoes, I love the bluetooth fixture
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean looking shoes comfortable to wear under armor always has the best quality. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Look good very comfortable with an added surprise a built-in GPS tracker that you can download an app from Under Armour either walking running or biking that I didn’t know that was there works very well
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Strength
customer_reviews.text: Love the stable pronation as you walk. Brand new they kept feet cool and with a comfortable bounce in my step.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: The nest sneaker i have worn by far. Super ultralight classy confortable wide enough non slip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth and APP feature are great
customer_reviews.text: Fit great lightweight and durable. The APP has tons of features definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BRYAN HAWTHORNE

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge under armour fan and these shoes surprise me as they help me get faster. It comes with a subscription with Map My Run.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good shoe. Haven’t had them long enough to really test them. Light and comfortable. First time owner of UA shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BGP

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I have narrow feet and a high arch. Great stability and cushion. I will buy two more pairs and run a marathon with this shoe
customer_reviews.author: David Russell

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of UAs. The most comfortable shoe I've ever worn. love them. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Lecroy

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Quality
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable all day. Very good overall support. Feet don’t get tired
customer_reviews.author: SOXPATSFAN

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and encouraging
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable pair of shoes I have had. The digital technology works as it should. It not only keeps track of my activity, seeing my progress helps to encourage me to stay active.
customer_reviews.author: Murray Meents

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bigger
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 8.5 and it seems to be slightly bigger then a standard 8.5, but still very comfortable and honestly my best running shoe investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for running errands and walking 3-5 miles a day in. I love my ua hovr grey infinite tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: matt mc

customer_reviews.title: Good for big guys.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’2 240 and will run 15 -20 miles a week. This shoe offers great support, comfort, and is to bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Heron

customer_reviews.title: my wife loving it
customer_reviews.text: best running shoes she had in years, she telling me that she fill like running on clouds :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. I use them for work and they’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang Chau

customer_reviews.title: Are there width sizes or this shoe in a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are way way too narrow at the ball of my foot forward
customer_reviews.author: glenn page

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, as far as fit doesn't run small or large. Use the sizing chart and you'll be fine, very nice shoe! I'll buy another pair or 2
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Regular.
customer_reviews.text: Usually by my size in every shoe. But these came a little bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ortiz

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HOVR Infinite Running Shoe
product_meta.description: WINNER: 2019 Runner’s World “Recommended” Award. NEUTRAL: For runners who need flexibility, cushioning & versatility. DIGITALLY CONNECTED: UA’s Record Sensor technology tracks, analyzes & stores virtually every running metric so you know exactly what you need to do to get better. UA HOVR technology provides ‘zero gravity feel’ to maintain energy return that helps eliminate impact step after step. Compression mesh Energy Web contains & molds UA HOVR foam to give back the energy you put in. Engineered mesh upper is extremely lightweight & breathable, with strategic support where you need it. Internal heel counter for additional support that helps keep the back of the foot locked-in place. Die-cut, full-length EVA sockliner molds to the foot, eliminating slippage & providing ideal underfoot comfort. EVA midsole provides excellent cushioning & a responsive feel. Anatomically placed, deep flex grooves offer proper flexibility in key areas. Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight. Strategically placed, carbon rubber traction pods under the heel of the outsole deliver greater traction & durability at high-impact strike zones. 360° reflectivity for increased visibility on low-light runs. Offset: 8mm. Weight: 10.75 oz.
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need flexibility, cushioning & versatility
DIGITALLY CONNECTED: UA’s Record Sensor technology tracks, analyzes & stores virtually every running metric so you know exactly what you need to do to get better
UA HOVR technology provides ‘zero gravity feel’ to maintain energy return that helps eliminate impact step after step
Compression mesh Energy Web contains & molds UA HOVR foam to give back the energy you put in
